values.description: This indicator computes the Heikin-Ashi bar (HA) The Heikin-Ashi bar is calculated using the following formulas: HA_Close[0] = (Open[0] + High[0] + Low[0] + Close[0]) / 4 HA_Open[0] = (HA_Open[1] + HA_Close[1]) / 2 HA_High[0] = MAX(High[0], HA_Open[0], HA_Close[0]) HA_Low[0] = MIN(Low[0], HA_Open[0], HA_Close[0])
values.og:description: This indicator computes the Heikin-Ashi bar (HA) The Heikin-Ashi bar is calculated using the following formulas: HA_Close[0] = (Open[0] + High[0] + Low[0] + Close[0]) / 4 HA_Open[0] = (HA_Open[1] + HA_Close[1]) / 2 HA_High[0] = MAX(High[0], HA_Open[0], HA_Close[0]) HA_Low[0] = MIN(Low[0], HA_Open[0], HA_Close[0])
